metadata.authority_name: Bank for International Settlements — Basel Committee on Banking Supervision

content.verbatim_text: The Net Stable Funding Ratio (NSFR) requires banks to maintain a stable funding profile in relation to the composition of their assets and off-balance sheet activities. NSFR = Available Stable Funding (ASF) / Required Stable Funding (RSF) >= 100%. ASF includes capital, preferred stock, and deposits with maturities exceeding one year.
content.title: Net Stable Funding Ratio

structured_data.relevance_to_odgs: Long-term funding stability — governs asset-liability matching in ODGS financial process maps
